One of my colleagues asked an interesting question this week. We were experiencing issues with react-helmet and someone proposed to just write our custom component to do the same.

The proposed implementation looked something like this:

function PageTitle(props) {
  useEffect(() => {
    document.title = `${props.title} â€” TravelPerk`
  }, [props.title])
  return null
}

To be used in this way:

<PageTitle title="My page" />

My proposal was to make a Hook instead.
